issue.title: [JS] Consider implementing a tableFromArray
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16153](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16153). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The idea here is to implement a function that creates a table from an array of objects using the struct builder.
